018package com.scivicslab.actoriac.log;
019
020import java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService;
021import java.util.logging.Level;
022import java.util.logging.Logger;
023
024import org.json.JSONObject;
025import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.core.ActionResult;
026import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorRef;
027import com.scivicslab.pojoactor.workflow.IIActorSystem;
028
029/**
030 * Actor wrapper for DistributedLogStore.
031 *
032 * <p>This actor centralizes all database writes for logging. It should be created
033 * under ROOT and used by all accumulator actors in the system.</p>
034 *
035 * <p>To ensure logs are written without blocking workflow execution, this actor
036 * should be called using a dedicated ManagedThreadPool with 1 thread:</p>
037 *
038 * <pre>{@code
039 * // Setup
040 * system.addManagedThreadPool(1);  // index 1 for DB writes
041 * ExecutorService dbPool = system.getManagedThreadPool(1);
042 *
043 * // Usage from accumulator
044 * logStoreActor.tell(store -> store.log(...), dbPool);
045 * }</pre>
046 *
047 * <h2>Actor Tree Position</h2>
048 * <pre>
049 * ROOT
050 * ├── logStore              &lt;-- this actor
051 * ├── accumulator           (system-level)
052 * └── nodeGroup
053 *     ├── accumulator       (workflow-level)
054 *     └── node-*
055 * </pre>
056 *
057 * <h2>Supported Actions</h2>
058 * <ul>
059 *   <li>{@code log} - Log a message with level</li>
060 *   <li>{@code logAction} - Log an action result</li>
061 *   <li>{@code startSession} - Start a new workflow session</li>
062 *   <li>{@code endSession} - End a workflow session</li>
063 *   <li>{@code markNodeSuccess} - Mark a node as succeeded</li>
064 *   <li>{@code markNodeFailed} - Mark a node as failed</li>
065 * </ul>
066 *
067 * @author devteam@scivics-lab.com
068 * @since 2.13.0
069 */
070public class H2LogStoreIIAR extends IIActorRef<DistributedLogStore> {
071
072    private static final Logger logger = Logger.getLogger(H2LogStoreIIAR.class.getName());
073
074    /**
075     * The dedicated executor service for logger writes.
076     * Using a single-threaded pool ensures writes are serialized.
077     */
078    private final ExecutorService loggerExecutor;
079
080    /**
081     * Constructs a new H2LogStoreIIAR.
082     *
083     * @param actorName the name of this actor (typically "logStore")
084     * @param logStore the DistributedLogStore implementation
085     * @param system the actor system
086     * @param loggerExecutor the dedicated executor service for logger writes (should be single-threaded)
087     */
088    public H2LogStoreIIAR(String actorName, DistributedLogStore logStore,
089                        IIActorSystem system, ExecutorService loggerExecutor) {
090        super(actorName, logStore, system);
091        this.loggerExecutor = loggerExecutor;
092    }
093
094    @Override
095    public ActionResult callByActionName(String actionName, String arg) {
096        logger.fine(String.format("actionName = %s, arg = %s", actionName, arg));
097
098        try {
099            switch (actionName) {
100                case "log":
101                    return handleLog(arg);
102
103                case "logAction":
104                    return handleLogAction(arg);
105
106                case "startSession":
107                    return handleStartSession(arg);
108
109                case "endSession":
110                    return handleEndSession(arg);
111
112                case "markNodeSuccess":
113                    return handleMarkNodeSuccess(arg);
114
115                case "markNodeFailed":
116                    return handleMarkNodeFailed(arg);
117
118                default:
119                    logger.warning("Unknown action: " + actionName);
120                    return new ActionResult(false, "Unknown action: " + actionName);
121            }
122        } catch (Exception e) {
123            logger.log(Level.SEVERE, "Error in " + actionName, e);
124            return new ActionResult(false, "Error: " + e.getMessage());
125        }
126    }
127
128    /**
129     * Handles the log action.
130     *
131     * @param arg JSON with sessionId, actorName, level, message
132     * @return ActionResult
133     */
134    private ActionResult handleLog(String arg) throws Exception {
135        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
136        long sessionId = json.getLong("sessionId");
137        String actorName = json.getString("actorName");
138        String levelStr = json.getString("level");
139        String message = json.getString("message");
140
141        LogLevel level = LogLevel.valueOf(levelStr);
142
143        this.tell(store -> store.log(sessionId, actorName, level, message), loggerExecutor).get();
144
145        return new ActionResult(true, "Logged");
146    }
147
148    /**
149     * Handles the logAction action.
150     *
151     * @param arg JSON with sessionId, actorName, label, actionName, exitCode, durationMs, output
152     * @return ActionResult
153     */
154    private ActionResult handleLogAction(String arg) throws Exception {
155        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
156        long sessionId = json.getLong("sessionId");
157        String actorName = json.getString("actorName");
158        String label = json.getString("label");
159        String action = json.getString("actionName");
160        int exitCode = json.getInt("exitCode");
161        long durationMs = json.getLong("durationMs");
162        String output = json.getString("output");
163
164        this.tell(store -> store.logAction(sessionId, actorName, label, action, exitCode, durationMs, output),
165                  loggerExecutor).get();
166
167        return new ActionResult(true, "Action logged");
168    }
169
170    /**
171     * Handles the startSession action.
172     *
173     * @param arg JSON with workflowName, overlayName, inventoryName, nodeCount
174     * @return ActionResult with session ID
175     */
176    private ActionResult handleStartSession(String arg) throws Exception {
177        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
178        String workflowName = json.getString("workflowName");
179        String overlayName = json.optString("overlayName", null);
180        String inventoryName = json.optString("inventoryName", null);
181        int nodeCount = json.getInt("nodeCount");
182
183        long sessionId = this.ask(store ->
184            store.startSession(workflowName, overlayName, inventoryName, nodeCount),
185            loggerExecutor).get();
186
187        return new ActionResult(true, String.valueOf(sessionId));
188    }
189
190    /**
191     * Handles the endSession action.
192     *
193     * @param arg JSON with sessionId, status
194     * @return ActionResult
195     */
196    private ActionResult handleEndSession(String arg) throws Exception {
197        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
198        long sessionId = json.getLong("sessionId");
199        String statusStr = json.getString("status");
200
201        SessionStatus status = SessionStatus.valueOf(statusStr);
202
203        this.tell(store -> store.endSession(sessionId, status), loggerExecutor).get();
204
205        return new ActionResult(true, "Session ended");
206    }
207
208    /**
209     * Handles the markNodeSuccess action.
210     *
211     * @param arg JSON with sessionId, actorName
212     * @return ActionResult
213     */
214    private ActionResult handleMarkNodeSuccess(String arg) throws Exception {
215        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
216        long sessionId = json.getLong("sessionId");
217        String actorName = json.getString("actorName");
218
219        this.tell(store -> store.markNodeSuccess(sessionId, actorName), loggerExecutor).get();
220
221        return new ActionResult(true, "Node marked as success");
222    }
223
224    /**
225     * Handles the markNodeFailed action.
226     *
227     * @param arg JSON with sessionId, actorName, reason
228     * @return ActionResult
229     */
230    private ActionResult handleMarkNodeFailed(String arg) throws Exception {
231        JSONObject json = new JSONObject(arg);
232        long sessionId = json.getLong("sessionId");
233        String actorName = json.getString("actorName");
234        String reason = json.getString("reason");
235
236        this.tell(store -> store.markNodeFailed(sessionId, actorName, reason), loggerExecutor).get();
237
238        return new ActionResult(true, "Node marked as failed");
239    }
240
241    /**
242     * Gets the dedicated executor service for DB writes.
243     *
244     * @return the DB executor service
245     */
246    public ExecutorService getDbExecutor() {
247        return loggerExecutor;
248    }
249}
